<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monstrous Peacemaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=82) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Half-Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=86" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your dual human and orc nature has given you a unique perspective, allowing you to bridge the gap between humans and the many intelligent creatures in the world that humans consider monsters. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks against non-humanoid intelligent creatures and against humanoids that are marginalized in human society (at the GM's discretion, but typically at least including [giants](/Traits.aspx?ID=79), [goblins](/Traits.aspx?ID=81), [kobolds](/Traits.aspx?ID=224), and [orcs](/Traits.aspx?ID=124)). You also gain this bonus on Perception checks to [Sense the Motives](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) of such creatures.
